results.title: Impact of beta 1 selectivity and intrinsic sympathomimetic activity on potential unwanted noncardiovascular effects of beta blockers.
results.text_hl: However, @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Thoracic_Injuries</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013898 @@@chest problems@@@ may be treated effectively with @GENE_MS4A1 @GENE_931 @@@beta 1@@@-selective drugs, including @CHEMICAL_Acebutolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000070 @@@acebutolol@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Metoprolol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008790 @@@metoprolol@@@.
